alert.note: Alert for Holmes (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 14 at 8:39AM EDT until July 14 at 9:15AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Panhandle Florida, including the following counties, Bay, Holmes, Walton and Washington. * WHEN...Until 1145 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 739 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Vernon, Bonifay, Chipley, Bradford, Live Oak, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Wausau, Westville, Ebro, Holmes Valley, Millers Ferry, Smyrna, Sylvania, Red Head, Hinsons Crossroads, Greenhead, Whitehead Crossroads, Spring Hollow and Riverside. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
